text: You poor thing.
Child, eat this.
Child.
Go on.
I will bring you more meat.
Eat slowly.
Mom.
Geon!
I told you to reach out to me if anything were to happen to him.
How could you let things come to this?
He will be fine once he absorbs human energy.
He returns back to normal.
Your son has run wild.
I shall retrieve his soul.
No!
You were the one who turned my son into a soul shifter.
Either get him another body,
or feed him the energy of human souls!
Bring back my son.
Bring back my son!
If word gets out that I used forbidden sorcery,
we will both be doomed.
No…
Please…
No, please. Geon.
Stay with me for just a bit longer.
My son…
Why do the bodies of soul shifters turn like rocks when they run wild?
A crack forms when the bodies clash with the souls they carry,
which causes them to lose energy.
This is already the eighth soul that has run wild.
I guess I should stop shifting souls.
You should go to the royal palace.
His Majesty has been asking about the new spell
that you have been trying to master.
I hear…
you have been trying to master a new kind of spell.
It is nothing grand. It is just a trick I tried out for fun.
I know I cannot ask to live for longer.
However,
it saddens me that I do not have an heir.
I wish you a quick recovery.
I cannot do anything with this sick body.
But I might have a chance
if I were to live in a body that is young and healthy.
There is no way for humans to switch bodies.
But you can.
The alchemy of souls.
That is forbidden sorcery.
If a soul clashes with the body, it could even turn into an evil spirit.
How could I dare
move the soul of a king to another person's body?
How about your body?
Not for too long. Just seven days.
Let us switch bodies for just seven days.
I heard you once gave a soul a dead man's body
and that it lived in that body for over half a year.
I am a king protected by the skies, and you are the best mage in this land.
So what is there to worry about?
And after seven days, you can turn things back.
You have mastered the ability to do something
that only the best mages can do.
Yet you are just wasting your time
shifting souls into dead bodies.
Jang Gang.
Give this king a different body.
His Majesty and I have switched bodies.
I shall make Do-hwa mine.
If she bears a child, know that it is mine.
Do-hwa.
Do-hwa.
You are very beautiful.
No, that cannot happen.
That cannot happen.
No!
The energy of the sky rules the wind, clouds, and rain.
This energy reached the ground
and created a huge form of energy.
A country was built around Lake Gyeongcheondaeho,
a lake that embodied that energy.
The name of the country was Daeho, due to the enormous lake it had.
Humans who had the power to control this great energy
were called mages.
This story is about the mages of Daeho, a place that does not exist
in both history books or maps.
20 YEARS LATER
So you are Naksu,
the Shadow Assassin who has been going around
killing the mages in the city.
They call me Naksu,
for wherever I go,
heads fall to the ground.
A beautiful name, is it not?
Kill her.
Shoot!
Do not let her get away.
-Capture her. -Yes, my lord!
Let us go that way. Follow me.
Over there!
I will not die like this.
I cannot.
Goodness, you are so impatient. I am coming.
What do you want?
Oh, my goodness!
TAVERN
She is dead.
She does not have the blue mark.
This blue mark proves that her soul has left this body.
Does that mean she failed
to enter another body?
SONGRIM
One.
Two.
Three.
Yul, come here.
Is she Naksu?
Yes.
This mark shows that her soul has left the body.
Remember this mark. When someone tries to switch bodies,
it leaves a blue bruise like this right on top of their heart.
Does that mean her soul escaped her body?
She seems to have tried, but I think she failed.
This proves that her soul has escaped her body,
but we found no signs of her soul having entered another body.
-It is a whistle. -A whistle?
I once had a similar one myself back when I had a pet bird.
Did she have a pet bird?
I think she had it for quite a while.
It looks like it is an important item.
She may have been an assassin who killed people like it was nothing,
but she was still human. She must have had a story of her own.
A lot of people have already seen Naksu's body.
Word will spread about the alchemy of souls.
Has it been 20 years since we have seen a soul shifter?
Yes.
The last soul shifter ran wild and ended up killing many people.
I am worried that might happen again.
Uncle!
Uncle, I heard Naksu was a soul shifter.
Master Heo, did you see her too?
You seem awfully excited to start rumors.
Rumors have already spread. I came as soon as I heard.
-Where did you hear it? -At Chwiseonru.
You are a mage of Jeongjingak.
But instead of practicing, you go to bars and listen to rumors.
Songrim Jeongjingak is not only a place for mages to practice their spells,
but also a place to gather information.
Also, Dang-gu here will
follow in your footsteps
and become the leader of the Songrim household.
He should know his liquor.
Now, tell me.
Which liquor tastes best at Chwiseonru?
I do not go there as often anymore now that Uk is not here.
"Uk"? The son of Jang Gang?
Is he not learning how to write at the village school in Yeongchundang?
He got kicked out of there ages ago.
Right now, he is in Gisan.
I sent him to receive training from Buddhist Monk Ho-yeong.
Uk went to train at a Buddhist temple this time?
Today, I shall end my training.
You have not even finished your training.
How dare you decide to end the training without my permission.
You asked me to expand my knowledge,
so I read and memorized hundreds of spell books.
You asked me to train my mind,
so I patiently sharpened hundreds of swords.
However, you never taught me any kind of spell.
The only lesson I learned here is that
you have no intentions of teaching me spells at all.
Now that I have learned a big lesson,
I would like to end it and leave.
The leader of Songrim asked me to keep you here for three years.
I know you are building a sanctuary with the money I paid you in advance.
I will not ask for a refund, so I hope it is successfully built.
Where do you think you are going? I never said you could leave!
Did it sound like I was asking for your permission?
You were conceived through your mother's affair
and were abandoned by your father.
So what would you know about respecting your master?
I refuse to teach a guy like you.
I may not know much about respecting a master,
but I do know how to be a creditor.
Say one more word,
and you will not be able to build that sanctuary.
Because I will be getting a refund.
No one in this world will teach you spells because of your father.
Goodness, thank you for your concern.
I will find my own master.
Someone extremely powerful and skilled.
Mu-deok, are you all right?
Why did I have to enter a body like this one?
I am sure she was blind.
But why is it that I see?
Is it because I am a different soul?
She did not even have a blue mark showing I entered her body.
How unusual.
Try to bear with the motion sickness. We are almost there, Mu-deok.
"Mu-deok."
She is a blind girl from the countryside who got sold off to the fortress.
Sit down. You will fall.
Thanks for the journey.
I will be off now.
What is wrong with me?
I have no strength.
Is this body not capable of even climbing this?
My arms feel weak.
Mister!
-Help me! -What…
-Mister! -Oh, dear!
Mu-deok, hold on!
Mister!
Turn the boat around! Go back!
-My goodness. -Oh, dear! Mu-deok!
I will fall.
Mister!
Why were you hanging from there when you cannot even see?
You could have gotten hurt.
This is really bad.
My strength is gone.
Is it motion sickness again?
I am so worried about how weak you are.
Weak.
This body is unbelievably unhealthy and weak.
I should not switch bodies too soon. Let us stay as Mu-deok for now.
I am sorry, Mister.
It is fine.
It is all because your body is weak.
Let us fill ourselves up.
-Enjoy. -Thank you.
Today, let us eat good food.
It is chicken. Enjoy.
As an assassin, I am sensitive to the smell of blood.
Thus, I do not eat animals that shed the same colored blood as humans.
-I will pass. -Just eat.
It is my first time eating meat.
It is delicious.
Eat up.
I really did not want to send you there,
but it was the only place that agreed to take a blind person.
"There"? Where are you talking about?
An old woman took her in after she lost both her parents.
But she got sick and recently passed away.
The debt she had due to her illness got passed onto her,
which is why she's here to be sold off.
I will be off now.
You cannot sell this poor soul to a brothel.
-I wish you well. -But…
I cannot believe he fed me chicken just to sell me to this place.
I will rip you to pieces as soon as I regain my power.
You are way too skinny.
I wonder if you will become prettier if you become chubbier.
Just give up. Getting chubby will not make me prettier.
I am useless and not suitable to work at a brothel.
Sell me off to someplace else.
You talk very eloquently.
I heard you sing well.
I hope you sing as well as you talk.
You should wash first. And doll yourself up.
You even know how to dance?
Did it look like a dance?
If my moves contained power, your arm would have fallen right off.
I am older than you, so you should speak in honorifics.
You better treat our customers with respect too.
You just wait. I will kill you too.
A lot of powerful people come to our brothel.
The Four Seasons of Daeho are also regulars of Chwiseonru.
The four what?
There are four different types of beautiful people in Daeho Fortress.
And they are called the Four Seasons.
The daughter of the Jin family who has the vitality of spring.
Jin Cho-yeon.
The heir of the Park family who has the energy of a hot summer.
Park Dang-gu.
The genius of the Seo family who is as noble as the sunset in fall.
Seo Yul.
Then there is Jang Uk, the successor of the Jang family
who is as dazzling as the winter snow.
The Jin, Park, Seo, and Jang family.
They are the most well-known mage families in Daeho.
Their children are known as the Four Seasons.
Is that what they are called in the fortress?
There is my summer prince.
If he is the heir of the Park family,
he must be Park Jin's nephew.
Park Jin.
He was there that night too.
Jin.
Seo.
Jang.
Park.
The Four Seasons?
Once I come across all four of you, it will be the end of it.
May you greet your deaths as beautifully as your names.
Who are you here to meet today?
My uncle told me to come and fetch someone.
Fetch someone? Who?
A trainee in Gisan
humiliated his master and got sent away.
I bet this is where he is hiding.
Will you look at that?
He must have craved seafood because he was stuck in the mountains
for so long.
I guess he is in that room.
Goodness.
Thanks to you, my uncle has to go
all the way to Gisan to beg for the monk's forgiveness.
Meanwhile, you are here enjoying this damn crab.
No, I have not eaten it.
It is such a hassle to eat.
I am glad you came. Break the shell with your spell.
Unbelievable.
I do know how to crack the shell and pick out just the meat.
But maybe I should use that spell on you, not the crab.
Dang-gu, if that monk had been kind enough to at least teach me that,
I would not have left that way.
What good is it if you cannot do it?
Your dad blocked you from casting spells.
Then he should have helped me break that.
That is what masters do. They help their students.
No one in Daeho is brave enough
to go against your dad like that.
But some live fearlessly.
For example,
the Shadow Assassin, Naksu.
Do not be ridiculous.
I heard she is so skilled that even the leader cannot beat her.
She is dead.
Her soul left her body, so that means she might still be alive.
Who told you that?
Do you think I am here just so I can eat crab?
This is the fastest place
to hear everything that goes on in Daeho.
Pick out the meat already.
Put those spells to good use and pick out the crab meat.
Why can you not pick out the meat yourself, you lazybones?
You look pretty now that you have washed.
Let me put makeup on you.
Ju-wol, I will just do it myself.
But how? You cannot even see.
I have never done this in my life,
so I need to prepare myself.
I would like to be alone for a while.
Sure. Come out when you are ready.
Being blind makes it easier to fool people.
I need money to run away.
Are these made of real gold?
This is jade.
Mu-deok, try applying this new rouge.
What are you doing?
Ju-wol, what is wrong?
Can you see?
Catch Mu-deok! Catch the thief!
It is too high.
That way!
What are you looking at?
You…
Do not make a sound.
I heard a blind girl recently joined the place.
But you can see.
They told me your name.
I think it started with a "D" or something.
No.
Oh, I remember.
Mu-deok.
Yes, I am Mu-deok.
I know what you look like,
so if you do not stay quiet until I leave,
I will come back and behead you.
What is so funny?
You have beautiful eyes.
Cut the nonsense.
Right, sorry. Only your eyes are beautiful.
You must be crazy.
Mu-deok.
Mu-deok!
Come on. There is not much in there.
Just…
take this instead.
Hey…
-What are you looking at? -What? Nothing.
Dang-gu.
I heard Naksu, the Shadow Assassin, uses Tansu.
What do you know about Tansu?
I know enough. I read about it in my free time.
TANSU
You see, Tansu is
a type of swordsmanship that only the best mages can learn.
You flick energy with a blade just like how you flick water.
A single strike is enough to kill someone.
But why do you ask?
I am just wondering if this crab leg almost could have killed me.
Give it here. Give it to me. I will pick out the meat--
Listen, Uk. You are aiming at a vital point.
I could die.
Yes, she aimed at my vital point in just one go.
But why did she roll off then?
Why is it that this tiny body keeps craving food?
If I do not eat, I only become weaker.
I have no other choice.
Now is not the time to fight. I should hold it in.
The mages of Jeongjingak are here.
I heard an assassin has entered Songrim Jeongjingak.
What fool would break into Jeongjingak?
She aimed for the leader, but got caught.
The assassin is a young lady.
My goodness gracious.
He would have seen my dead body.
He likely did not recognize me.
I am sure he did not recognize the whistle either.
There are no signs of Naksu having visited this place.
I think she failed to find a new body.
Even if she succeeded, she probably is not showing herself
because she is facing a problem.
An assassin with a revealed identity must be discarded.
We will have to retrieve her body and sword.
Get rid of all everything that has to do with her.
What happens if she is still alive?
She will either get killed for being a soul shifter,
or her soul will clash with her new body,
and she will turn into a rock.
I trained her to become the best assassin.
It is a pity.
How much longer do you need?
It is expensive, so I need to take a closer look.
I will not ask for too much. Just pick a price and pay me.
Over here!
-It is her. -What is going on?
Take her away!
Where am I? Did I get caught?
Then is this Songrim?
Are you awake?
Who are you? Where is this place?
It is the house of Master Jang Gang, the head of Cheonbugwan.
"Jang Gang"? So this is the Jang family's house?
I wonder why Young Master brought home such a weak girl.
-"Young Master"? -That is right.
Young Master Jang Uk paid money to bring you here from the brothel.
I heard you stole his Jade Plaque at the brothel.
Take this instead.
Hey…
Why would he bring me here?
I was worried when he said he was going to bring home a girl,
but you put me at ease.
He only helped out of pity.
Here. Get changed.
Mu-deok.
-What is this? -What do you think?
It is your uniform as a servant.
Also, you need to speak to me using honorifics.
Young Master Jang is weak,
so he gets tired very easily.
Make sure you do things as soon as you are asked.
And always put on a smile no matter what he says.
Where is my answer?
-Yes, ma'am. -Good.
He wanted to see you as soon as possible, so get changed and go see him.
Answer me.
Yes…
Miss.
I would rather you call me "ma'am."
"Young Master"?
Why would he bring me home?
You have beautiful eyes.
Did he fall for me?
For this face?
He has very low taste.
Anyway, it might be safer for me
to live here until I fully recover.
If he is head over heels for me, at least he will treat me right.
Then…
I guess I will have to continue living my life as Mu-deok here.
Young Master. It is me, Mu-deok.
Come in.
Young Master.
Thank you so much for saving my life
and bringing me here.
It just took a few men to drag you here.
-I am disappointed. -I know it was rude of me
to threaten you with a crab leg, but I hope you will put that behind you.
You sound a lot more polite now.
I will do my best to serve you right.
Fine, you do that.
Mu-deok, go and get me some water.
Yes, Young Master.
Gosh.
I am not thirsty. It is to wash myself.
Oh, I see. I understand, Young Master.
I will just take a bath instead of washing my face.
Gosh, that is hot.
This is much too hot.
Right, Young Master.
Oh, gosh. It is cold.
The water is freezing.
It is not freezing.
It is. I will catch a cold if I wash in cold water.
-What is his deal? -It is so cold.
Did he not fall for me?
What are you doing, Mu-deok?
Yes, Young Master. I will pour in some more hot water.
It is salty.
Too sweet. Too spicy.
It is too long. What is this taste?
I'm not going to eat.
The water smells weird.
It smells?
Bring me a new bucket.
Get a different blanket.
I want the blue blanket tonight.
He does not do anything, but he washes three times a day.
I will kill him.
Once I regain my energy, he'll be the first one I kill.
Young Master, I brought you cold water.
-I brought… -Forget it. The water has cooled
to just the right temperature.
Good work…
I mean, your work was all in vain, Mu-deok.
If only I had the power…
If I just had a fraction of the power I used to have…
What is going on?
What is happening?
What is so funny?
What?
What is with that smile?
It is nothing.
The water is nice and cold.
Go fetch my clothes.
Right, Young Master.
Gosh.
What are you doing?
Here you go.
You may leave. Get some rest.
Yes, Young Master.
That Spirit Plaque will allow me to break the barrier and enter Songrim.
But I cannot do that right now
because I do not have the power to cast spells.
I should find my sword.
I might get my power back if I find my sword.
With that Spirit Plaque,
I will be able to enter Songrim.
SONGRIM
How long do you plan to keep Naksu's body at Jeongjingak?
If she succeeded in finding a new body,
Naksu…
will come back for her sword.
She will come here looking for her body.
Let us see how things turn out.
Maybe it is because your father's room is always empty,
but it never seems to get dusty.
I wonder when he will return.
The colors in your mother's portrait are starting to fade away.
We should call a painter to repaint the colors.
I memorized all the books you told me to read.
Now, teach me how to practice spells
just like how you taught Yul and Dang-gu.
That sword belongs to your father.
Take it out.
Due to the spell that has been cast on me,
I am unable to take out a sword that has a spell on it.
You cannot even take out your own father's sword.
How do you expect to learn spells?
Why can you not open my gate of energy so I can practice casting spells?
I…
cannot do that.
Then find me another master.
No master can do that.
No one in Daeho will be able to go against your father
and open your gate of energy.
Then are you saying
I will never have the ability to practice spells?
That was
the fate given to you by your father.
Why!
Why would he decide my own fate?
No one even considers him as my true father anyway!
I will find someone.
A master who will open my gate of energy and teach me how to practice spells.
I will find someone myself.
Then I will take out that sword and break it in two.
I heard Young Master Jang got expelled again.
Why would the son of the great Lord Jang always get in so much trouble?
He is not his son.
Do-hwa, the most beautiful woman in Daeho,
slept with another man and had Jang Uk.
I doubt that rumor is true.
Then why would he block his son from casting spells
and live his life like a vagabond?
I wonder if he is really weak because his father put a spell on him.
The Spirit Plaque should be here somewhere.
Where is it?
Why did I have to hide here?
What will he think of me?
What should I say to him?
This was not what I had in mind when I brought you here.
Well…
You kept saying you were cold,
so I was just heating the bedding for you.
If you lie down right away, it will be nice and warm all night.
Is that so?
How kind of you.
-Good night, then. -Where are you going?
You came to keep me warm.
Keep my bed
nice and hot
all night long.
Heat it up.
What? Does he really like me?
Have I fallen for his tricks?
Young Master…
My body is not warm enough to keep you warm.
Ever since I was young, I easily got the chills.
So my body temperature is always very low.
All right.
I do not plan on doing what you want me to do.
Bring the brazier closer to me.
The brazier?
I just wanted you to bring the brazier near my bed
and keep it hot.
Keep it hot.
Here.
This is too close.
It will be too hot.
Oh, right. It will be too hot.
I will sell you if the fire goes out.
Keep the fire alive all night.
All right, Young Master.
All right. Dang-gu is here.
What is that? It is a whistle.
Yes.
I swear I made this.
Oh, right. I remember. You used to have a pet bird.
Why? Are you planning to get a new one?
No, not exactly.
I just found this on someone unexpected.
I wonder why she had it.
Maybe you gave it to her.
Maybe you forgot that you gave it to her.
No.
I clearly remember who I gave this to.
Then go ask her.
You are going to go at this hour?
I need to check something.
Who are those guys?
Intruders!
We have intruders!
Intruders!
Go on.
Out of the way!
Yul, what is going on?
The Training Center is on fire.
Who is at Jeongjingak?
Master Yul and Dang-gu.
Uncle, are you all right?
The intruders all left.
Jeongjingak is empty.
-Find them. -Yes, my lord.
Who were those guys?
Did the Danju send them here?
The soul you need to collect this time is Park Jin, the leader of Songrim.
Right.
He must have sent them here to retrieve my body.
Who is there?
Young Master?
What are you doing here?
Because of your eyes.
My eyes?
I knew the moment I saw you.
You are my master.
